unnormalised: Yeah, saw Mr. Sharma, the CEO of this startup, speak at the event. He kept mentioning how Ms. Khan, the CFO, is the real brains behind the operation. Also, apparently, Dir. Patel is leaving to start his own venture. Good luck to him! Heard he’s been offered the position of Pres. at some other big firm.
normalised: Yeah, saw Mister Sharma, the C-E-O of this startup, speak at the event. He kept mentioning how Miss Khan, the C-F-O, is the real brains behind the operation. Also, apparently, Director Patel is leaving to start his own venture. Good luck to him! Heard he’s been offered the position of President at some other big firm.
